titleStmt.title: Bad English, yet not Scotch. Mercurius moderatus: or Certain moderate animadversions touchin [sic] a printed paper intytled, An answer to the chief passages in the Scots declaration For prevention and avoydance ofe a new quarre, and sanguinarie combustion. Moderata durant, dissipa gentes quæ bella volunt.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin, Ireland.
